title: TRU - A New Life
description: Artist Bio:  I come from Espanola NM, a small town plagued by drug addiction. I myself spent 11 years consumed by this affliction. I have been 100% drug free since 10/21/11 and currently work in treatment. A lot of the lyrics in my music are about overcoming addiction, and some of the harsh realities that addicts face. I intend to spread a message that recovery from addiction is possible and show that by staying clean it is possible to pursue lost dreams.
